ART.name: Paper Wings
ART.1desc: Bring your childhood back by making Paper planes and compete.
ART.rules:
1. It is a single event.
2. Paper plane must only be constructed at the site out of one piece of paper.Standard A4 sheet, which will be provided.
3. The sheet must be modified by folding only! No ripping, stapling or glueing is allowed.
4. Planes must be launched by the person throwing it from a static position behind the marked line. Running and throwing or crossing the line will lead to disqualification.
5. Two trials per participant is allowed, the better result will be considered.
6. Pilots will be judged in two unique categories: Longest distance: How far the paper plane travels through the air.Longest airtime: How long the paper plane remains in the air.

ART.name: Art Hunt
ART.1desc: An event where you hunt for art supplies and showcase your inner artist by creating something incredible out of it. In this event, participants register in a team of two. First round is to hunt for the art supplies in the given time. In the second round, the participants have to create something skillful out of what they've found.
ART.rules:
1. A clue will be given to them and they will have to hunt for the art supplies in a given time limit.
2. They can start creating something artful as soon as they find the supplies.
3. Participants will be judged on the basis of innovative usage of the art supplies.
4. Decision of the judges will be final.

ART.name: Face Painting
ART.1desc:
Want to paint your friend’s face? It’s fun!
Face painting is artistically applying paint to a person’s face.
 Drag your friend along.
 A theme will be given on spot.
 Get creative and start painting your friend’s face.
 The best face wins!
ART.rules:
1. It is an event for 2 participants.
2. Participants must bring their own materials.
3. Duration of the event will be 90 minutes.
4. The theme will be given on spot.
5. The judge’s decision is final.

CAUTION: MAKE SURE YOUR PAINTS ARE SKIN FRIENDLY

ART.name: Pictionary
ART.1desc: This time we bring you a fun game where one person draws based on a topic and the other person has to guess the topic.
ART.rules:
1.One of the two participants will pick up a chit containing a topic and has to represent it pictorially on the board while the other team member guesses the words. 
2. The roles of the two team members can be swapped as per the convenience of the team.
3. Letters or words cannot be drawn on the board. Code word or symbols cannot be discussed by the team members before the event.
4. Round one: Two teams will go on dais One member from each team pick a chit containing a topic and draw on the board. The time limit is 5 minutes. The teams that guess maximum number of words in the time allotted goes to the next round.
5. Round two: The qualified teams will each get 7 minutes to guess as many words as possible. The team with most number of guesses (points) wins. The team with the nest highest score gets the second place..

ART.name: Blind Art
ART.1desc: Literally Blind art where one of the participants is blindfolded and sketches while being instructed by their partner.The participants will be given a topic on spot. They get 5 minutes to discuss what they want to draw. One of the participants in this event will be blindfolded while the other one is handcuffed. The one who is handcuffed has to describe a piece of art to the blindfolded participant who has to then go on to draw what is being described to them.
ART.rules:
1. The topic will be given on spot.
2. The first 5 minutes are allocated to discuss what to draw after the topic is given.
3. One of the participants is blindfolded and the other is handcuffed. They can start drawing.
4. The time limit is 90 minutes.
5. The Judges will decide the winners.

TECH.name: Tech Quiz
TECH.rules:
1. No. of members in a team : 2
2. No of rounds : 3
3. Use of electronic gadgets is prohibited
4. Replacement of team members is not allowed during the quiz.
5. Prompting answers is strictly prohibited.
6. Quiz Master is God.
7. Violation of any of the above mentioned rules will lead to disqualification.

TECH.name: Robotics
TECH.1desc: RC your own bot through our challenges and scores.
TECH.rules:
1. No of participants per team: 1‑4
2. No. of rounds: 4
3. Robots have to be under 300X300 mm by length and width.
4. Robots must run on board batteries only.
5. Robots can be brought built or can be finished at the venue. Experts will be available for help.
6. Robotic toys or ready to assemble robots are strictly prohibited.
7. Only ground based robots can participate.

TECH.name: Technocrat
TECH.rules:
1. It is an individual event.
2. No. Of rounds: 2
3. Use of electronic gadgets is strictly prohibited inside the venue.
4. Judges decision will be binding.

TECH.name: Web Designing
TECH.participation: Individual event or a team of 2
TECH.rules:
1. Number of rounds: 2
2. Individual event or a team of 2
3. Use of Mozilla thimble tools in each round is mandatory.
4. Each round is based on any particular theme given by the judges.
5. The participants are required to remix, design web pages and design applications with respect to the given theme.
6. Not following any of the rules will lead to disqualification.

TECH.name: Circuit Breaker
TECH.1desc: Prove your analog and digital skill
TECH.rules:
1. No of rounds : 2
2. Time limit: 30 mins
3. Participants should be at the event venue 10 mins prior to the starting of the event
4. Activities like disturbing others and using foul language will lead to  disqualification directly
5. Winners will be decided by the judges

TECH.name: Tech Hunt
TECH.1desc: Solve the clues to reach the destination.
TECH.rules:
1. No. of participants per team: 1 ­ 4
2. Time limit : 2 Hours
3. Participants should be at the event venue 10 minutes prior to the starting of the event.
4. Activities like disturbing other participants & using foul language will lead to disqualification directly.

TECH.name: Code Completion
TECH.1desc: Be the first to Complete the Code modules.
TECH.rules:
1. No. of participants : 1
2. No. of rounds : 2
3. Time limit : QUALIFIER ROUND 30 mins ,FINAL ROUND 45 mins .
4. Programming language used: c‑programming
5. Using of mobile phones is prohibited
6. Not following any of the rules will lead to disqualification

TECH.name: Cryptography
TECH.rules:
1. No. of participants: 2.
2. No. of Rounds: 3.
3. Participants to be present at the event venue 10 minutes prior to the starting of the event.
4. Activities like disturbing the participants and using foul language will lead to disqualification.

GAMING.name: Need For Speed
GAMING.1desc: Need for Speed: Most Wanted is set in an open world environment. The game takes on the gameplay style of the first Most Wanted title in the Need for Speed franchise. Most Wanted allows players to select one car and compete against other racers in three types of events: Sprint races, which involves traveling from one point of the city to another, Circuit races, each having two or three laps total and Speed runs, which involve traversing through a course in the highest average speed possible.
GAMING.rules:
The game has to be played on keyboard as well as controllers.
Tournament Format:
1. A particular number of players will form a set. These players will compete with the members of each set. The emerging winner of each set, will then move to the next round.
2. The race type will be disclosed to you on spot. (Circuit/Sprint/Speed Run)
3. At the end of each match, the players must retain the confirmation screen, and show it to the referee.
Car :
1. All cars will be unlocked.
2. A specified time (to be disclosed on spot) will be given for the participants to free roam and select the car of their choice.
3.Only the DEFAULT settings of the car will be applicable. Any modifications whatsoever, will lead to disqualification.
4. Junkman is NOT allowed.
5. Personal save profile is strictly prohibited.
Race mode options:
The race mode will be intimated on the spot.All other settings related to the UI is left to the participants discretion, and can be changed for simulating personal experiences

GAMING.name: Counter Strike GO
GAMING.1desc: Counter-Strike (officially abbreviated as CS) is a series of multiplayer first-person shooter video games, in which teams of terrorists and counter-terrorists battle to, respectively, perpetrate an act of terror (bombing, hostage-taking) and prevent it (bomb defusal, hostage rescue).For the first time in Cultura, we bring to you CS : GO, the most played multiplayer shooting game of all times. This will be a team event and your team will have a chance to be both CT and Terrorists. All the matches will be in competetive mode. So, get ready to win cash prizes and respect!s
GAMING.rules:
1. Players can bring their own mouse pads, keyboard headphones and other peripherals to stimulate their own best playing environment.
2. Tournament format 5 v 5
3. Maps will be decided on spot
4. Friendly fire will be on
5.All matches will consist of 14 rounds, out of which each team will be CT and Terrorists for 7 rounds. The decision regarding which team will be CT first will be mutual or through a coin toss.
6.In case of a tie, one extra round will be held, the winner of which will be the final winner for that match.In case of any disputes, the decision of the ECs will be final

GAMING.name: FIFA
GAMING.1desc: FIFA is an acronym for Internationale de Football Association or International Federation of Association Football in English. It is the world's foremost governing body of association football, known popularly as soccer or simply football.
GAMING.rules:
1. Language:-English.
2. Fifa Verison:- 15 Or 17
3. Time Duration:- 4 to 5 minutes.
4.Difficulty Level:- Legendary
5. Knockout stage of 1 vs 1. (The one who win will go to 2nd Round)
6. Can choose between International and Club teams

GAMING.name: Mini Militia
GAMING.1desc:
Doodle Army 2: Mini Militia (DA2) is a free-to-play 2D shooter game released for iOS and Android devices. Mini militia is basically a mobile gaming event, which is based on some of the shooting games,which can be played single or as a tsg team, there's score count...
The person or team with the highest point wins based on a limited time
GAMING.rules:
1.No pro packs
2.Everyone should play the base version
3. No upgrades allowed4. Decision of the coordinator is final
5.  Mini militia is basically a mobile   gaming  event, which is based on some   of the shooting games,which can be   played single or as a tsg team, there's   score count... The person or team with   the highest point wins based on a   limited time.
6. In case of draws... There will be a rematch in tag team.. N fo singles... It will be like the person with lowest number of deaths

GAMING.name: Call Of Duty
GAMING.1desc: Call of Duty is a first-person shooter video game franchise. The series began on Microsoft Windows, and later expanded to consolesand handhelds. Several spin-off games have been released. The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, but later games like Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare are set in modern times or in futuristic settings.
GAMING.rules:
1. Game version: Call of duty modern war fare 4.
2. Players can bring their own mouse, keyboard, headphones and other peripherals to stimulate their own best playing environment.
3. Tournament format 4 v 4.
4. Maps will be dedicated on spot.
5. Perks are not allowed.
6. Granade Launcher not allowed.

GAMING.name: Dota2
GAMING.1desc: Call of Duty is a first-person shooter video game franchise. The series began on Microsoft Windows, and later expanded to consolesand handhelds. Several spin-off games have been released. The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, but later games like Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare are set in modern times or in futuristic settings.
GAMING.rules:
DOTA 2 (Tournament)
Competition method:5 versus 5 
Game version Dota 2
Sides:will be determined by the host.
First Ban:Dire team.
Victory condition:The first team to destroy the other team  ancient.
SPECIFIC RULES:
1. During the tournament all members team must have their team tag during the event.
2.Players must be prepared before their scheduled games.
3. All competitors must be present 15 minutes prior to their scheduled match.
4. Teams who fails to join the room at the first fifteen (15) minutes from the start of their schedules will automatically lose at the game one (1) of their match series. (excuses are not entertained, even if the game is updating, etc.)
5. Teams who fails to join the room at the next fifteen (15) minutes will automatically lose the whole series (game of three matches).
6. Players who are registered must be the one to play. If a reserve is needed, only the listed reserves must also play.
7. Final calls are irrevocable.

MUSIC.name: Western Solo Singing
MUSIC.1desc: Philharmonics provides a platform for students from all colleges to display their creativity and express themselves, particularly in the western genre. Students are given an opportunity to captivate the judges with their distinct and mesmerizing voices. Let your voices travel through our minds and speak to our souls.
MUSIC.rules:
1.Time limit: Prelims: 2+1 ,Finals: 3+1 min
2.It is an individual event.
3.Genre: Any Western genre and any non-Indian language.
4.Karaoke OR one accompanying instrumentalist is allowed.( No prerecorded audio.) However, Karaoke  must be provided at the venue 30 min before the start of the event.
5. Judging will be based on vocals only.
6. Judging Criteria:Voice Quality,Voice Modulation,Rhythm, Pitch, Variation, Choice of the song.
7.Points will be deducted on exceeding the time limit.
8.The judge's decision will be final and abiding.

MUSIC.name: Indian Solo Singing
MUSIC.1desc: Music is what feelings sound like. Indian music is definitely our go-to genre when it comes to expressing our emotions. If you have the voice that can win hearts and steal the show, then get ready to dazzle the stage as we bring forth SUR-TAAL. In this event, you are given the ideal platform to show your talent and prove your mettle. Show us your creativity in Sur, Taal, and Raag.
MUSIC.rules:
1.Time limit:Prelims: 2+1 min, Finals: 3+1 min
2.It is an Individual event.
3.Genre: Any Indian genre and any Indian language.(Songs with English phrases not allowed)
4.Karaoke OR one accompanying instrumentalist is allowed.( No prerecorded audio.) However, Karaoke must be provided at the venue 30 min before the start of the event.
5.Electronic Tanpura can be used.
6.Judging will be based on vocals only
7. Judging Criteria:Voice Quality,Voice Modulation,Rhythm, Pitch, Variation,Choice of the song.
8.Points will be deducted on exceeding the time limit.
9.The judge's decision will be final and abiding.

MUSIC.name: The Fifth Element
MUSIC.1desc: What's a song without rhythm? If you think you have the talent to dazzle the stage with your rhythm and beats, Beatbox Battle is your home ground. It's time to go zen. If you have what it takes to get us grooving with your percussion skills, then come prove it. Get your game on and get ready to bring the roof down by showing us what you got. Register with us now and make sure you're ready to battle it out.
MUSIC.rules:
1. Do not bite(copy) your competitors work, we want originality.
2. No. of rounds will be decided prior to the event based on the number of participants.
3. The event will mostly be split into prelims, semifinals, and finals.
4. Top 6 contestants will qualify for semi-finals
5. The judge may introduce improv rounds. Be prepared for impromptu battles.
6. Each participant will be given 2 and a half minutes to perform. Marks will be deducted for extra time taken.
7. Profanity or vulgarity of any sort will result in disqualification.
8. Participants must be present at the venue of the event when called on stage to perform.
9. Judging Criteria:Voice Quality,Voice ,Modulation ,Rhythm, Pitch, Variation ,Choice of the song.,9.Points will be deducted on exceeding the time limit.,10.The judge's decision will be final and abiding.

INFORMAL.name: Treasure Hunt
INFORMAL.1desc: let your imagination and detective skills go wild ! Are you a curious cat? do you relish the thought of finding tresures unknown to the world ? Give the indiana jones in you a chance and set out on an expidition to discover treasures unbeknowst to you.
INFORMAL.rules:
1. A team should consist of 2 participants
. Participants are strictly prohibited from using vehicles, usage of vehicles can result in the DISQUALIFICATION of the team
3. All the clues must be preserved till the end of the event, ONLY IF THE PREVIOUS CLUE/CLUES ARE SUBMITTED WILL THE NEXT CLUE BE GIVEN
4. Time duration 2 hours
5. Clues will be placed within 3km radius

INFORMAL.name: Fashion Show
INFORMAL.1desc: Do you have the flair for fashion? The power to create magic on stage with those stellar designs. Live your dream to set fire on the ramp and make the heads turn. Let your attitude do the talking.
INFORMAL.rules:
1. It is a team event. Number of members : 10+2
2. Time limit : 7+1 (including stage setup)
3. Theme : open theme
4. Usage of props are allowed.
5. Inflammable objects and use of water are strictly prohibited.
6. Music should submitted in a pendrive one and half hours before the event starts.
7. Teams will be judged on costumes, theme, walking stance and attitude.
8. Decision of the judge will be finally
INFORMAL.eventco:
Nithesh Kumar Reddy D - 9535033013
Koushik N - 9071116240

INFORMAL.name: Blitz Chess
INFORMAL.1desc:
1.Each player gets 10 minutes to finish their game.Thus, the total time for a match is 20 minutes.
2.It follows the basic rules of chess(FIDE) with an additional time constraint.
3.If none of the players checkmate at the end of game,then the one with highest points wins.
INFORMAL.rules:
1.This event follows the FIDE chess regulations
2.The clock for each player is set to 10 mins.The player who checkmates or has more points at the end of the game(20 mins) wins.
3.The players are not allowed to disturb their fellow players during game in any way.
4.The players are not allowed to leave the room without the permission of arbiter.
5.In case of any doubts while playing, players must first confirm with the arbiter.

INFORMAL.name: Hogathon
INFORMAL.1desc: It's a mega food eating competition and the race of hogging it all as fast as you can.For all the food-lovers who are big time foodie, a glutton and loves to eat it all at one stroke. Face off with all your friends and find out who can gulp down the maximum amount in the fastest time in two high intensity rounds.The only event in which you can win a prize by eating your favourite food.
INFORMAL.rules:
1. 2 rounds will be held.
2. 1st round team of 6 participants are made.
3. 1 will qualify for next round.
4. In last round whoever finishes early he will be the winner.
5. The final call regarding competition lies with organizers.
6. Limited Registration

INFORMAL.name: Photography
INFORMAL.1desc: Indulge and soak yourselves in capturing unseen and Kodak moments through those lenses ,Tell the world a new story and show how badly you are bitten by the shutterbug. Through shutter up explore the new possibilities of lights and shadows and artistry at your fingertips.
INFORMAL.rules:
1.All photographs must be taken in the CMR Institute of Technology campus 2.Photos can be captured in any type of camera. (mobile phones, DSLRs, medium formats etc 3.HDR (high dynamic range) photographs aren't permitted. 4.Photographs must be in digital formats. The photographer retains all the rights and the copyrights to their images; they simply give us the permission to publish their images.
5. Watermarks of any kind are not permitted.

INFORMAL.name: Blogging
INFORMAL.1desc: Put on your thinking caps, for one of the most exciting events in CULTURA’18 - BLOGGER - just got a new perspective. Where imagination and innovation are pushed to their very limits and timing is the key. If you have what it takes to innovate, imagine and blog then let the colours of your mind infuse themselves with this event. Spread the message and change the way people think.Go out and spread the word!!!
INFORMAL.rules:
1. 2-day event.
2. Real time photography must be used in making a blog.
3. Pictures from Internet will lead to Disqualification or deduction of your score.
4. Only editing of Real time photography is allowed.
5. All the blogging IDs will be given by the Coordinators.
6. All the participants should attend before the inauguration of the ceremony (Preferably so you can cover most of the event).
7.Participants can register and participate in the event till 11’o clock.
8.No participant is allowed to join on second day.
9.Internet connection will be given to all the users.
10. Every participant should carry their own Laptop and Camera.
11. The event end before 2-hours of Valedictory Function.
Rules are tend to change.
INFORMAL.venue: Old Cdx or any AV room on Day1 and any lab equipped with computer and internet on Day 2

KANNADA.name: Kalabhinaya
KANNADA.1desc: Kalabhinaya is a event where one can showcase their acting skills
KANNADA.rules:
1.Bring your id cards.
2.Event has 2 rounds and the description about the event will be conveyed at the time of event.
3.Judges decision is final.
4.Round 1: Preliminary
 Round 2: Final Round.
5.Only shortlisted participants move on to the Final Round.
6.It is mandatory that participants should sing only Kannada bhavageethe songs.
7.Multiple participants from the same institution are allowed.
8.Contestants are judged on the basis of raga,swara,shruthi and expression.
9.Decision of judges will be final.
10.They will have to switch their sides (for or against) according to the whims and fancies of the judges.

KANNADA.name: Pakka Kannadiga
KANNADA.1desc: Are you a proud kannadiga? Can you talk very well in kannada? If you have good amount of knowledge about kannada language, literature, history, cinema, then this is the perfect platform to prove you are pakka kannadiga
KANNADA.rules:
1.There are totally 3 rounds.
2.Prashnotthara -question and answers. Duration: 20 min.
3.Aashubhashana - pick and speak. Duration: 2+1 min.
4. Samvada -  debate. Duration: 4+4 min. (for-against).
4. Participants should be present 30 min before at the venue
5.Duration of the event is 2 hours

KANNADA.name: Rasa Prashne
KANNADA.1desc: RASA PRASHNE is a kannada quiz competation where questions are purely related to Karnataka's history, politics, Kannada literature as well as current trends pertaining to karnataka.
KANNADA.rules:
1. Two members in a team.
2. Competation consists of 3 rounds.
3. First round is a qualifying round.
4. Top 6 teams would be sent to next round.
5. Marks scored in first round is just for qualifying.
6. Marks scored in second and third round will be considered.
7. Answers should be given within 1 minute or else it will not be considered
KANNADA.eventco:
Naga Sanith Reddy P - 7676702524
Sanket Vijayakumar Gourai – 8050834978

KANNADA.name: Ankura
KANNADA.1desc: Ankura is not what one sees but what one can make others see,most exciting and creative drawing event.Draw/sketch based on the topic (given on spot).
KANNADA.rules:
1.Participants are requested to be at the venue 30 mins before the commencement of event.
2. Requested to carry college IDs with them.
3. Duration: one and half hour.
4. Materials and other necessities for the event to be brought by participants (only drawing sheets will be provided).
5.Mobile phones and other electronic gadgets are not allowed.

KANNADA.name: Anthyakshari
KANNADA.1desc: Antyakshari is a game mainly based on Kannada songs.Antyakshari​ is a spoken parlor game which tests the knowledge on Kannada songs.
KANNADA.rules:
1. You should carry ID cards
2. Total time of the game would be of two hours.
3.There would be four rounds having different modes.
4.These rounds would be declared only at the time of the game.
5. The decision of the judges would be final
